title: For Biden, It’s a Time for Choosing—Priorities, That Is
sub_head: The president and his party in Congress need to carefully pick the programs they are willing to fight for as 2021 draws to a close
body:
Presidents aren’t issued magic wands upon taking their job, as any occupant of the Oval Office could tell you. Certainly as he nears the end of a tough first year, President Biden could testify to that.
But let’s imagine he could have a magic wand for a day, and use it to salvage what he most wants out of his big Build Back Better package of social and climate-change programs. What would he pick?
